## ParserOptions.markup property

The parser can change TeX markup (<!-- -->\\<!-- -->textsc, \\<!-- -->emph, etc) to a text equivalent. The defaults are HTML-oriented, but you can pass in your own configuration here

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
markup?: MarkupMapping;
```
